Module it.polimi.ingsw.GC24

Package model.movebehaviors

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    MoveBehavior
    Contains the strategies for finding the reachable squares and for moving the builder.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BlockUpMove
    It's a Move Behavior decorator that adds the following effect: if the builder move up, opponent builders would not be able to move up on their next turn (their move behaviors would be decorated with NoUpMove
    DoubleNoBackMove
    It's a Move Behavior decorator that adds the possibility to move twice (the second move can't be to the initial square)
    MoveDecorator
    It's the abstract Move Behavior decorator (all the concrete move decorator must extend this class)
    NoUpMove
    It's a Move Behavior decorator that limits the neighborhood, impeding to move up
    OpponentPushMove
    It's a Move Behavior decorator that adds the possibility to move into an opponent builder square (if the opponent builder can be forced one square straight backwards to an unoccupied square at any level)
    StandardMove
    It's a Movec Behavior main component that allows a standard move
    SwapWithOpponentMove
    It's a Move Behavior decorator that adds the possibility to move into an opponent builderâ€™s square by forcing their builder to the space yours just vacated.
    UnlimitedPerimetralMove
    It's a Move Behavior decorator that, each time your builder moves into a perimeter square, adds the possibility to immediately move again
